Package dev.nhuels.eventservice.controller

Class EventController

java.lang.Object
dev.nhuels.eventservice.controller.EventController
@RestController @CrossOrigin @RequestMapping("/event") public class EventController extends Object
REST controller for managing events. This controller provides endpoints for getting event details, creating, updating, and deleting events, and listing all events. It also provides endpoints for managing the artists, organizers, and shifts associated with an event.

    • create

      @PostMapping("/create") @PreAuthorize("hasRole(\'MODERATOR\')") public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<?> create(@RequestBody @Valid @Valid EventCreateDto eventCreateDto)
      Endpoint for creating a new event.
      Parameters:
      eventCreateDto - the DTO containing the details of the event to create
      Returns:
      a ResponseEntity containing the ID of the created event

    • update

      @PostMapping("/{eventId}/update") @PreAuthorize("@eventSecurity.isEventOrganizer(principal, #eventId)") public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<?> update(@PathVariable @NotNull @NotNull Long eventId, @RequestBody @Valid @Valid EventCreateDto eventCreateDto)
      Endpoint for updating an event. This endpoint is only accessible to the organizer of the event.
      Parameters:
      eventId - the ID of the event to update
      eventCreateDto - the DTO containing the new details of the event
      Returns:
      a ResponseEntity with a success message

    • delete

      @DeleteMapping("/{eventId}/delete") @PreAuthorize("@eventSecurity.isEventOrganizer(principal, #eventId)") public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<?> delete(@PathVariable @NotNull @NotNull Long eventId)
      Endpoint for deleting an event. This endpoint is only accessible to the organizer of the event.
      Parameters:
      eventId - the ID of the event to delete
      Returns:
      a ResponseEntity with a success message

    • isUserOrganizer

      @GetMapping("/{eventId}/organizers/{userId}") public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<Boolean> isUserOrganizer(@PathVariable @NotNull @NotNull Long eventId, @PathVariable @NotNull @NotNull Long userId)
      Endpoint for checking if a user is an organizer of a specific event.
      Parameters:
      eventId - the ID of the event
      userId - the ID of the user
      Returns:
      a ResponseEntity containing a boolean indicating if the user is an organizer of the event
